Name: Guns N Stuff
About the game: With up to four players, choose to battle each other in free for all with a variety of weapons ranging from a simple pistol to a sumo suit! Not a fan of beating your friends? Battle alongside or alone against waves of different zombies constantly getting stronger. - Single Player / Local Multiplayer up to 4 players - 2+ players recommended - Use of steam remote play recommended - 2+ players required - Modifiers to adjust stats such as health and weapon drop rates - Custom Win Messages - 21 Maps - 1-4 players - 3 different maps - Progressively stronger zombies as well as bosses and types of zombies - Perks and weapon cannon
